## User Story

As a [type of user], I want [a goal] so that [reason].

## Acceptance Criteria

- GIVEN [context]  
  WHEN [event]  
  THEN [outcome]  

- GIVEN [another context]  
  WHEN [another event]  
  THEN [another outcome]
